metadata.synopsis: The player finds Gur Hunter in the Undercity with his children.Only happens if you killed Cazador and released the prisoners.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book.Astarion - Act 3 - Gur Follow Up - Astarion Status - Astarion Stayed Vampire SpawnAstarion - Act 3 - Gur Follow Up - Prisoners Status - Prisoners ReleasedAstarion - Act 3 - Gur Follow Up - Teleport to Gur inside Cazador's Dungeontalk to the gur leaderAstarion - Act 3 - Gur Follow Up - Teleport to Gur Hunter & his kids in the SewersTalk to the child

0.speaker: Chessa
0.text: At least I am not alone. I could not have borne that eternity.

1.speaker: Chessa
1.text: Is this my life now? Darkness and hunger?
